column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered a small pizza
column2: and it was already plenty for two people. Good thing we ordered the spinach stuffed bread appetizer
column3: the 30 minute wait can be most excruciating when you're stomach is about to tear itself apart out of pure hunger. The bread was moist
column4: and the spinach inside wasn't overpowering at all.
